content: This is going to be a long shot, but does anyone have experience integrating Tugboat.qa with Backdrop? I'm trying to get the B.org custom module borg_tugboat working on my site using my own Tugboat account and repo, but I'm getting an error that doesn't happen on B.org... It's a matter of some urgency, so if anyone can assist I'd be very grateful!
I haven't tried at all but curious. Wasn't there a port from Backdrop to d7 of a tugboat QA module?

So I originally took the B.org module and started refactoring it to make it more generic and release it as a contrib project anyone can use. Then I ran into this issue, and thought maybe I'd messed something up. So then I tried using the B.org module as-is, but had the same problem (so it seems to be something else (my site, Tugboat account, etc.). While looking into this I found the Drupal module. Apparently someone had a similar idea a while ago and started porting the B.org module to Drupal. From the looks of it they basically just tried to get it working in Drupal, not refactor it like I was doing. But not much has happened there (I think I got further than they did).
I've now rewritten parts of the module to use Tugboat's new API, which is much easier and actually works for me! So all good now :grinning_face_with_smiling_eyes:
